// src/components/ChampionMastery.js
import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{getChampionMastery}from'../services/api';import{Box,Avatar,Typography,CircularProgress}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ChampionMastery(_ref){let{puuid,version,championMapping}=_ref;const[masteryData,setMasteryData]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const fetchMasteryData=async()=>{const data=await getChampionMastery(puuid);if(!data.error){setMasteryData(data.topMastery);}setLoading(false);};fetchMasteryData();},[puuid]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CircularProgress,{size:24,sx:{display:'block',margin:'20px auto'}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{bgcolor:'#1f1f2e',p:2,borderRadius:2,boxShadow:3,color:'#ffffff',textAlign:'center'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"subtitle2",component:"div",sx:{fontWeight:'bold',mb:1},children:"Mastery"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'space-around'},children:masteryData.map(champion=>{const championName=championMapping[champion.championId.toString()];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{textAlign:'center'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Avatar,{src:`https://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/${version}/img/champion/${championName}.png`,alt:championName,sx:{width:56,height:56,mb:1}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body2",sx:{fontWeight:'bold'},children:championName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"caption",children:[champion.championPoints," Points"]})]},champion.championId);})})]});}export default ChampionMastery;
